title: Karen Matthews slammed Madeleine McCann's parents after she was jailed for abducting her own daughter Shannon
text:

The woman who faked the abduction of her own daughter allegedly poured scorn on the parents of missing toddler Madeleine McCann . 
Karen Matthews , 41, who was jailed for her role in the ‘kidnap’ of nine year old Shannon, is said to have blasted Gerry and Kate McCann from her prison cell. 
In a bizarre rant, it is claimed she told her pal Julie Bushby: “I’ve been judged and I’m paying for it but Maddie’s mother was bad too. At least my daughter was never left alone.” 
And in her cruel outburst she added: “Don’t get me onto the McCanns, we’ve all got something to say about them. 
“We’re too lower class for them but we can still have an opinion. There seems to be one rule for them and another for us but she was a dreadful mum. Karen Matthews poured scorn on Kate and Gerry McCann (Photo: Getty) Missing Madeleine McCann 
“She left one, two, three babies alone while she was out eating and drinking with her mates. My Shannon was kept away from her family but she was never left alone.” 
Madeleine, three, disappeared from the family’s holiday apartment in Praia de Luz, Portugal, in May 2007. 
The following February, Shannon vanished from her mum’s home in Dewsbury, West Yorks. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Chilling video of Karen Matthews begging for Shannon's return Share this video Watch Next 
She was found 24 days later at the home of Craig Meehan, where she had been drugged and hidden inside a divan bed. 
Matthews and Donovan were sentenced to eight years over their kidnap plot. 
The pair had allegedly been inspired by Madeleine’s disappearance and invented the scheme to claim a reward for ‘finding’ her. Shannon Matthews was abducted by her own mum (Photo: PA) 
Matthews’ best friend and former neighbour Julie, who kept diaries of her prison visits, said: “Karen talked about Maddie and her family, the difference and unfairness of their social situations. 
Mother-of-three Julie, 46, who led the painstaking search for Shannon, believes Matthews was too stupid to have thought of the kidnap plot herself. 
She said: “I want to sit her down and ask ‘Why?’ She’s not got the highest IQ and I wonder if she was coerced into doing something she didn’t want to do. Karen Matthews was jailed for kidnapping her own daughter 
“Karen was guilty and put her hands up but she wasn’t the brains behind the plot to kidnap her daughter. 
“I’m not excusing her in any way but I and the rest of the neighbourhood want to know the real reason for what happened. We want answers.” 
Matthews, served just four years of her sentence, and was freed in April 2012. She is now living at a secret location in the south of England. Julie Bushby doesn't believe Karen was the mastermind behind the kidnap plot (Photo: Tony Spencer) 
Last month a BBC series, The Moorside, starring Sheridan Smith, recreated the dramatic events surrounding Shannon’s disappearance. 
Madeleine McCann’s parents, Kate and Gerry, both 48, from Rothley, Leicestershire, have not given up their search for their daughter Like us on Facebook
